reviewText: I found it to be dull and uninteresting, and am concerned that the people who need the information will be totally turned off and not bother with it.  There is good information, but the format does not bring it to the forefront. I was disappointed.  And the discussion at the end, did not resolve anything or bring the issue to a conclusion.  This is such a serious subject and problem, there are answers to getting freedom from this addiction, and I didn't see answers being brought to bear.
